name: Keyry
description: App that allows the userto take notes and list the notes affiliated keywords. The keywords help with filtering and querying notes when searching topics of relevance.

e01c0129-0c8e-4e80-8a29-b9da4e96ac6b._description: Text file created by users that can be searched for by searching its name or affiliated keywords.

title.description: Name of the file and title of the document.

keywords.description: Affiliated keywords related to the document that it may be discovered by.

editTitle.description: Change the name of the note

save.description: Save the document if there has been any changes to the note.

editText.description: Allows the user to edit the text.

dateCreated.description: Date when the user has created the document.

lastEdited.description: Date the user has last edited the note.

author.description: The user that created the note.

affca484-8dd1-4e20-890b-5a620c5779e9._description: Directory file that stores Notes and sub directories.

name.description: Name of the directory that the user inputs when creating the folder.

size.description: Count of files that are included in the current directory and subdirectories.

newNote.description: Creates a new note in the current directory. Adds note to the notes array. Method should be called when user clicks save on the note. Returns confirmation whether or not the save succeeded.

params.description: New note that is created by the user.
params.name: note

newFolder.description: Adds a new subdirectory to the current directory. Returns boolean confirmation if successful.

notes.description: Collection of all the notes stored in the directory.

folders.description: Collection of all of thr subdirectories.

search.description: Searches directory and subdirectories for keywords or names. Returns all matching text files as an array.

params.description: Word or phrase user is searching for.
params.name: keyword

deleteFile.description: Removes selected file. Returns boolean result if the operation succeeded.

deleteFolder.description: Deletes subdirectory and everything contained in the subdirectory. Returns whether the operation has succeeded.

rename.description: Rename the current directory. Returns a boolean confirmation if the operation is successful.
